import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../../tailwind.css' import axios from 'axios'; export const CustomForm = (props) => { const {requestType, dailyId, btnText} = props; const handleFormsubmit = (event, requestType, dailyId) => { event.preventDefault(); const university = event.target.elements.university.value; const study = event.target.elements.study.value; const others = event.target.elements.others.value; const news = event.target.elements.news.value; const want = event.target.elements.wanttodo.value; const summary = event.target.elements.summary.value; const evaluation = event.target.elements.evaluation.value; console.log(university,study, others, news, want, summary, evaluation); switch (requestType) { case 'post': return axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/daily/', { university: university, study: study, others: others, news: news, wanna_do: want, summary: summary, evaluation: evaluation, }) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(error => console.log(error)); case 'put': return axios.put(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/daily/${dailyId}/`, { university: university, study: study, others: others, news: news, wanna_do: want, summary: summary, evaluation: evaluation, }) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(error => console.log(error)); } } return (
handleFormsubmit( event, requestType, dailyId )}>

Make it as long and as crazy as you'd like

); };
